name: Baby Purple Troll Doll
description: This doll is 12 inches tall. The head and hands are made from hand-dyed cotton jersey. The body is made out of four layers of muslin with reinforced seams. It is stuffed with clean carded wool. This doll is weighted with millet which has been baked and treated with lavender oil. Eyes, mouth and hair are hand-embroidered with cotton floss. Dollâ€™s outfit is removable and washable. The doll itself is not washable due to the millet.

name: Baby Waldorf Doll with Red Cap
description: Hello there.  Here is a little ten inch baby Waldorf doll for the littlest of hands.  She is softly stuffed with clean carded wool.  She also features hand embroidered features.  Her hat is made out of the softest red velour and is permanently sewn on so it won't get lost.  Her outfit is white with mint green polka dots.  This doll is perfect for the youngest child.  Thanks for looking.

name: Waldorf Doll with Red Cap
description: An 18 inch handmade Waldorf doll by Coppermouse. She has hand-embroidered little locks of blonde hair, blue eyes and rose-colored lips. Her hat is made out of cotton velour and is permanently sewn on. Her outfit is a multicolored polka-dot cotton fabric. She is stuffed with clean carded lamb's wool. Thanks for looking!
